code: import Blockly from'blockly/core';import'blockly/blocks';import{pythonGenerator}from'blockly/python';Blockly.Blocks['struct_create']={init:function(){this.appendValueInput('NAME').setCheck('String').appendField('create struct named');this.appendStatementInput('FIELDS').setCheck(null).appendField('with fields');this.setPreviousStatement(true,null);this.setNextStatement(true,null);this.setColour(160);this.setTooltip('Create a struct with the given name and fields');}};pythonGenerator.forBlock['struct_create']=function(block){const name=pythonGenerator.valueToCode(block,'NAME',pythonGenerator.ORDER_ATOMIC)||'MyStruct';const fields=pythonGenerator.statementToCode(block,'FIELDS');return`class ${name}:\n  def __init__(self):\n${fields}`;};
